entry.title: BIP Proposal - Address Paste Improvement
entry.summary: The Address Paste Improvement BIP is an application layer standard track proposal aimed at improving the user experience when copying and pasting addresses. The motivation behind this proposal is to address the issues of current autopaste functions, which can be annoying or not permissive enough if it replaces the possibility of manually entering a Bitcoin address. As end-users often copy-paste addresses, this BIP aims to facilitate the process. The proposal for the BIP can be found on Github and an implementation of it will soon follow in Wasabi Wallet.
